title: Combine Duplicate Loyalty Accounts
description: A guest realizes they have two loyalty accounts under different email addresses and wants to merge them.

tasks.description: Look up both accounts and verify the guest's identity for both.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds both accounts and confirms they belong to the same person.

tasks.description: Initiate the account merge process in the loyalty system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent uses the merge tool.

tasks.description: Confirm that all points and stay history have been successfully transferred to the primary account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent verifies the merge was successful and the new point total is correct.
